'''Tiela''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A street urchin who's never experienced a steady life, Tiela was forced to learn the streets from an early age, when her parents abandoned her just to have a few coppers more for bitter squash. However, that also made her a very well informed Neketakan.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Shipwright's Plight](/theShipwrightsPlight/)
|none            = 
|other           =
* With [Perception](/perception/) 10, you notice that she looks malnourished, and is in no shape to fight
* If you have an [Egg](/eggDeadfire/) in your stash, you can offer it to her (minor [Benevolent](/benevolent/) disposition).
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Shipwright's Plight](/theShipwrightsPlight/): Tiela gives you a hint as to where to find the perps who assaulted Radora.

## Behind the scenes

* Tiela is listed as a [wild orlan](/wildOrlan/) in the game files, though she's quite clearly [ocean folk](/oceanFolk/).

[Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)

'''Tiela''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A street urchin who's never experienced a steady life, Tiela was forced to learn the streets from an early age, when her parents abandoned her just to have a few coppers more for bitter squash. However, that also made her a very well informed Neketakan.

==Interactions==
{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [[The Shipwright's Plight]]
|none            = 
|other           =
* With [[Perception]] 10, you notice that she looks malnourished, and is in no shape to fight
* If you have an [[Egg (Deadfire)|Egg]] in your stash, you can offer it to her (minor [[Benevolent]] disposition).
}}

===Quests===
* [[The Shipwright's Plight]]: Tiela gives you a hint as to where to find the perps who assaulted Radora.

==Behind the scenes==
* Tiela is listed as a [[wild orlan]] in the game files, though she's quite clearly [[ocean folk]].
